amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 29, as modified, 50, 51, 52, 55, 56, 57, 58, 59, 60, 61, 63, 65, 66, 68, 71, 75, 80, and 160 printed in House Report 113-108. The modified form of amendment No. 29 appears on page H3559 of the Congressional Record of Thursday, June 13, 2013. See page D567 of the Congressional Record of Thursday, June 13, 2013, for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc consisting of amendments printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 numbered 29, as modified, 50, 51, 52, 55, 56, 57, 58, 59, 60, 61, 63, 65, 66, 68, 71, 75, 80, and 160.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A016) offered by Mr. McKeon.
McKeon amendment (A016) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A016) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
